description: Main application entry point for a Flutter project, defining the root widget and home page layout.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a customizable title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a loading message and progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the Flutter app by instantiating MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget class, describing the UI layout.
